title: Loftware Named One of Best Companies to Work for in New Hampshire
text:
Enterprise Labeling Solutions Provider Recognized for Second Year Running by BusinessNH Magazine
Portsmouth, NH (PRWEB) September 25, 2015
Loftware , Inc., the global leader in Enterprise Labeling Solutions , today announced that it has been recognized, again this year, by BusinessNH Magazine as one the state’s “Best Companies to Work for.”
BusinessNH Magazine and their partner, the NH Businesses for Social Responsibility, joined together to select and recognize businesses that go out of their way to create fun and high engagement workplaces for their employees. This year’s winners have been highlighted as companies that “exemplify how developing a respectful, creative and supportive corporate culture can bring a company to new heights.”
“We are excited to be recognized again this year as one of the best companies to work for in New Hampshire. It has always been important to us to recognize the value of each of our employees and provide an enjoyable and rewarding working environment,” stated Loftware President & CEO, Robert O’Connor. “We have been very fortunate to experience sustained growth over the past few years and look forward to adding to our dedicated team of professionals as we continue to scale our business to meet the needs of customers across the globe,” he added.
This year’s competition was revamped from prior years, placing more focus on direct employee feedback. The 2015 competition included an employee engagement survey that required participation from at least 50% of the company’s workforce. Employers also completed an extensive survey detailing benefits and workplace practices. The judging panel combined those results to recognize the select companies that “exceeded the bar of excellence.”
Loftware continues to add to their growing staff and currently has a variety of job postings. To find out more about existing employment opportunities at Loftware go to the company careers page.
About Loftware
Loftware, Inc. is the global market leader in Enterprise Labeling Solutions with more than 5,000 customers in over 100 countries. Offering the industry’s most comprehensive labeling solution, Loftware’s enterprise software integrates SAP®, Oracle® and other enterprise applications to produce mission-critical barcode labels, documents, and RFID Smart tags across the supply chain. Loftware’s design, native print, and built-in business rules functionality drives topline revenue, increases customer satisfaction, and maximizes supply chain efficiency for customers. With over 30 years of industry leadership, Loftware’s Enterprise Labeling Solutions and best practices enable leading companies to meet their customer-specific and regulatory requirements with unprecedented speed and agility.
